title: The Ref Pattern
description: In this lab, the 'ref' keyword is explored, which is used in pattern matching or destructuring via the 'let' binding to take references to the fields of a struct/tuple in Rust programming language.

meta.title: Exploring the Ref Pattern in Rust
meta.description: Learn how to use the 'ref' keyword for pattern matching and destructuring in Rust programming.
meta.keywords: rust playground, destructuring, pattern matching, programming tutorial, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust online, rust commands, rust practice, ref
